question: Any kind of cargo must be placed and secured on a vehicle in such manner that during transportation:

answers.answer: All of the above requirements are met
Vehicle beams, the stop light, turn lights, reflective devices, vehicle registration plates, differentiating signs of the registering country, and hand signals envisaged by this Law are not concealed
Visibility and field of view is not impaired, the vehicle remains firm on the road and vehicle operation is not rendered complicated
Other road users are not put at risk, no damage is inflicted upon the State, public or private property and the cargo is not dragging or falling on the road
